Name: Star Boss
About the game: Star Boss is a simulation game where you can manage space base. You can make robots and spaceships,explore the space and fight with aliens. Backgound Story In 2400, Earth civilization's started interplanetary exploration, building Star Union. With exploration further, Star Union finds alien civilization too powerful. To accelerate civilization development, Star Union determines to begin 'Star Boss' project. Making Robots and Vehicles You can recruit team members, creat robots and make spaceships. Exploring Space Your team can be arranged to explore space, collect resourses and defeat monsters. Defending Alien Creatures Occasionally alien creatures will invade your base, which you need dispatch your team to defend. Command System You can enter commands to manage everything of your base, and you can even write javascript code. Ultimate Weapon science and technology: Anti-stealth, Tractor Enhancement Beam, Super Torpedo ultimate weapon robots: collecting 4, you’re invincible. godlike command: space command, time command, power command Plot and Events Main Line： A mysterious child looking for parents Two tragic ultimate BOSS And various random events, like using Time Command to win the lottery. Conclusion 20+ human members can be recruited 10+ robots and 9 spaceships can be made 70+ monsters、10+ stages、alien creatures of 10 levels can be challenged 100+ tasks、50+ achievements The game will support MOD, you can make your own robots, spaceships and events, etc.
